newsitem.title: UK: Reckitt & Colman gains after results.
newsitem.headline: Reckitt & Colman gains after results.

text.p: Shares in household goods manufacturer Reckitt and Colman Plc were indicated higher on Thursday after first-half profits met expectations.
The shares were up 10p to 691-1/2p by 0719 GMT in pre-market trade.
"The results were fairly mixed but largely in line with expectations," said Mark Clark, an analyst at UBS.
